randomLines: I'm not sure what's supposed to happen.

dialogs.intro1:
Han passat uns quants centenars d'anys des de que es va acabar el món.

El canvi climàtic va provocar inundacions, sequeres, huracans.

L'economia va col·lapsar. Tot estava perdut.

dialogs.interactSign: Sembla que diu… P A … S
dialogs.interactPinecone: Oh, una pinya! Puc treure'n alguns pinyons. Necessitaré alguna cosa per trencar la closca però...
dialogs.interactNote: I'll add this to my notebook. Looks like old instructions to go through a checkpoint that was nearby. I guess when the floods started everyone started leaving the area and they put controls to contain diseases. Crazy times.
dialogs.buggy1: Hmm that's weird. Nothing seems to be wrong with the engine, it's just not getting any power, the battery is completely dead.
dialogs.buggy2: Uh, it doesn't look like something that I can fix today. It's getting late so I should find some place to rest anyway.
dialogs.buggy3: There is some sort of building down the road. Looks like a good shelter.

dialogs.intro: Hm, doesn't look like anyone is been here for some time, but I bet I can find something useful lying around. I should start a fire and find some water, I'm running low
dialogs.encounterSurvivor2: Uhm… I'm sorry, I thought the place was abandoned, my car broke down and… eh…
dialogs.encounterSurvivor3: I don't think I can reason with him.
dialogs.encounterSurvivor4: ... What did just happen? Was that my radio?
dialogs.encounterSurvivor5: Ugh… No time to think about that, I'm losing a lot of blood.
dialogs.addWood: Now I need something to start the fire.
dialogs.setUpFire: Now I need something to start the fire.
dialogs.clothWithCleanWound: Good, that should stop the bleeding for now.
dialogs.clothWithoutCleanWound: I should clean up the wound first.
dialogs.cleanWound: Wound is now clean, I should cover it as soon as possible
dialogs.puddleWithGlassBottle: I can't, there's a cork stopper stuck halfway.
